content:
Yes, there are many options for vegan sweets that won't break the bank! Here are some recommendations:

1. Fruit - Fruit is a sweet and delicious source of natural sugars. Try chopping up apples, bananas, or strawberries and pairing them with nut butter or vegan chocolate chips.

2. Dark chocolate - Many brands of dark chocolate are vegan and can be a satisfying sweet treat. Look for brands with at least 70% cocoa content for maximum health benefits.

3. Homemade baked goods - Baking your own vegan treats at home can be cost-effective and fun. There are many vegan recipe blogs and cookbooks available for inspiration.

4. Dairy-free ice cream - Many brands of dairy-free ice cream are available at grocery stores, or you can make your own by blending frozen bananas with a splash of plant-based milk.

5. Energy balls or protein bars - There are many vegan snack bars and energy ball recipes available online that use ingredients like nuts, dates, and oats to create a sweet and satisfying snack.

6. Pudding - Pudding made with a plant-based milk and flavored with natural ingredients like vanilla or cocoa powder can be a simple and delicious sweet treat.

Remember, vegan sweets can still be high in sugar and calories, so it's important to consume them in moderation as part of a balanced diet.
